org.myrobotlab.gp
Class Choices

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Choice
          org.myrobotlab.gp.Choices
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Validatable
public class Choices
extends java.awt.Choice
implements Validatable

Combines model and view for a choice. The model is an array of Objects, the view presents their string representations and lets the user select one of them.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Hans U. Gerber (gerber@ifh.ee.ethz.ch)
See Also:
Serialized Form

Choices

public Choices(java.lang.String label,
               java.lang.Object[] choices,
               int selection)
Parameters:
label - a descriptive label for the choice component
choices - an array of Objects to pick one from
selection - the index of the initially selected item

display

public void display()
Description copied from interface: Validatable
Formats the data from the internal representation (the model) and presents it in the user interface component (the view). This method should be called when the component becomes visible.
